= Image Tool =

== feh ==
- -F        fullscreen
- -Z        zoom mode
- -x        bordeless window

`feh --recursive --randomize --bg-fill ~/.wallpaper`

> with [[crontab]], it's easy to auto switch wallpaper now.

== convert ==
ImageMagick

- -resize [width]x[height]
- -reisze 50%

== scrot ==
linux screenshot util

- default       fullscreen screenshot, save as DATA_TIME_screenshoft.png
- -d            delay time
- -c            count number
- -s            select rectangle or window
- -q            quality
- -t            scale, 10 -> 10%
